=== Last Position ===
(row = 7, col = 11)

Given that your current position has not changed from the last state (still at row 7, col 11), it suggests that a directional action was attempted but did not result in movement, likely indicating a rotation. Therefore, I need to decide on an action to ensure meaningful progress in the game.

At position (7, 11), the possible next actions (assuming a 1-square movement in any direction) should be carefully considered:
- Up (to (6, 11)) is open (background dirt).
- Down (to (8, 11)) is also open (background dirt).
- Left (to (7, 10)) is open (background dirt).
- Right (to (7, 12)) is blocked by a boulder (@).

However, moving right is not a viable option. I will choose to move up to (6, 11) since it leads to an open area while avoiding enemies and obstacles.

``` Action:4 ```
Moving up to position (6, 11) should help explore further and find opportunities to collect diamonds without encountering obstacles. I expect this aligns with the strategy of navigating the area efficiently.
